title: Trouble resizing the message list in Thunderbird 115
content: I can't resize the message list to show fewer than 6 emails. Actually 5.5, since the 6th is cut off. I'm sure I could do this with previous releases. How can I get around this?
creator: milthorst

creator: libcub1

title: Thunderbird fails to filelink large files
content: I use Filelink (w/Dropbox) to attach large videos to emails. Videos up to ten minutes long(232MB) work perfectly while 15 minute videos(346MB) fail to upload to Dropbox with an ["Unable to upload 'Graphics Meeting.mp4'] to Dropbox" popup. There's plenty of space available on Dropbox and if I copy a large video directly to the Dropbox directory it uploads flawlessly. If Filelink has a max file size, I have no idea where to find it or how to increase it.
creator: DJM

title: Email account deleted - want to keep emails, wont copy
content: I have an email account that has been deleted but I want to keep the original emails and move them into a local folder. I have tried to move, copy and paste, drag and drop but they will not copy to local. I have tried to move emails from other accounts but cannot do this either but have done before, I am not sure if this is related to the deleted account or if there is another issue.
creator: AussieDenis
